views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 8 to 13

Automatically pauses your music when you turn the volume down to 0 and resumes it, if you increase the volume again.
(Works with the volume buttons on your iDevice or Headphones and the system volume slider in CC or on the lockscreen)

Configure options from Settings.

Added iOS 13 support Fixed holding volume down on the lockscreen
Fixed holding volume up when resuming
Added A12 support
Changed: Music now resumes only if it was playing before muting it
Added: Option to enable resuming on Lockscreen
Added: Option to enable resuming on "Ringer"
(more details in settings)
